generalInfo.name: Victor Eyer
generalInfo.location: Campos dos Goytacazes, Rio de Janeiro, Brasil

professionalExperience.title: Desenvolvedor Fullstack Pleno
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Development of API payment systems and franchise management with NodeJS, TypeScript, and React.

professionalExperience.title: Desenvolvedor de software
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Fullstack development in a multi-tenant API system using NodeJS, Express, and PostgreSQL.

professionalExperience.title: Desenvolvedor Backend Pleno III
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Backend development focused on checkout and billing using NodeJS, Salesforce API, and PostgreSQL.

abilities.name: React and Node.js Development
strongPoints: Solid experience in fullstack development using React and Node.js with TypeScript.
Experience with building and maintaining APIs and dynamic UIs.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate proficiency with React hooks and performance optimization in complex UIs.
suggestedQuestions: Describe a complex UI you built with React and how you optimized its performance.
How do you handle error management in Node.js API development?

abilities.name: APIs with Node.js & TypeScript
strongPoints: Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and TypeScript in multiple projects.
Familiar with frameworks like Express and NestJS.
weakPoints: Limited experience with GraphQL APIs.
pointsOfAttention: Check knowledge in asynchronous programming and handling large data payloads.
suggestedQuestions: How would you handle asynchronous tasks and error handling in Node.js?
Explain how you optimize API endpoints in a high-load environment.

abilities.name: Clean Code and SOLID Principles
strongPoints: Familiar with clean code practices and applying SOLID principles in development.
Consistently applies refactoring techniques to improve code readability and maintainability.
weakPoints: Limited exposure to complex SOLID applications in large codebases.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate understanding of dependency injection and interface segregation.
suggestedQuestions: How do you apply SOLID principles in your code?
Can you describe a scenario where you used dependency injection effectively?

abilities.name: SQL and NoSQL Databases
strongPoints: Experience with both SQL (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases.
Understands data modeling and query optimization.
weakPoints: Limited experience with complex data migrations and database tuning.
pointsOfAttention: Assess experience in database design and indexing strategies.
suggestedQuestions: What indexing strategies have you used to improve query performance?
Describe your approach to database schema design for a new project.

abilities.name: Automated Testing (Jest/Mocha)
strongPoints: Familiar with writing unit tests using Jest and Mocha for JavaScript applications.
Understands test-driven development practices.
weakPoints: Limited experience with integration tests and end-to-end tests.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate knowledge in setting up test suites and CI integration for testing.
suggestedQuestions: How do you ensure adequate test coverage in your projects?
Can you describe a scenario where test-driven development benefited your project?

abilities.name: DevOps & CI/CD (Jenkins/GitLab CI)
strongPoints: Experience setting up CI/CD pipelines with GitLab CI and deploying applications using Docker.
Familiar with the basics of containerization and cloud deployment.
weakPoints: Limited experience with advanced CI/CD features like blue-green deployments.
pointsOfAttention: Assess knowledge in configuring Docker and automating deployment pipelines.
suggestedQuestions: How would you set up a CI/CD pipeline for a microservices architecture?
What are some best practices you follow for Dockerizing applications?

abilities.name: Git Version Control
strongPoints: Extensive experience using Git for version control, including branching and merging strategies.
Understands Gitflow and is proficient with collaboration workflows.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate proficiency with resolving complex merge conflicts and rebasing.
suggestedQuestions: Can you explain your approach to handling merge conflicts in Git?
How do you manage feature branches in a collaborative team environment?

abilities.name: Agile Collaboration (Scrum/Kanban)
strongPoints: Experienced in working within Agile environments using Scrum and Kanban methodologies.
Collaborative and communicative with cross-functional teams.
weakPoints: Limited experience with advanced Agile roles like Scrum Master.
pointsOfAttention: Assess experience with sprint planning and retrospective processes.
suggestedQuestions: Describe your experience with sprint planning in an Agile team.
How do you handle changing requirements during a sprint?

professionalExperience.title: Analista ServiceNow
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Development and analysis in ServiceNow solutions, focusing on ITSM modules including Client Scripts, Workflow, Flow Designer, UI Policy, SLAs/OLAs, Business Rules, Widgets, Service Portals, ACLs, Scheduled Jobs, Integrations, and APIs.

professionalExperience.title: Desenvolvedor ServiceNow
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Developed ServiceNow solutions with a focus on ITSM modules including Client Scripts, Workflow, Flow Designer, UI Policy, SLAs/OLAs, Business Rules, Widgets, Service Portals, and ACLs.

professionalExperience.title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Fullstack development and maintenance of web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP with MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.

abilities.name: JavaScript
strongPoints: Experienced in JavaScript for both frontend and ServiceNow development.
Used in web development with HTML5, CSS3, and integration within ServiceNow ITSM modules.
weakPoints: Limited exposure to JavaScript frameworks outside of ServiceNow and basic frontend.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate proficiency in advanced JavaScript, particularly in frameworks and libraries.
suggestedQuestions: How would you handle complex JavaScript logic in a web application?
Can you describe a scenario where you optimized JavaScript performance in a project?

abilities.name: React and Node.js Development
strongPoints: Some experience with React.js in previous projects.
General understanding of fullstack JavaScript development using JavaScript and PHP for backend.
weakPoints: Limited experience with advanced React patterns and state management libraries.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate familiarity with React component lifecycle and hooks.
suggestedQuestions: How do you approach component re-renders and state management in React?
Describe your experience with fullstack development using Node.js and React.

abilities.name: SQL and NoSQL Databases
strongPoints: Experienced with MySQL and PostgreSQL databases for web development.
Capable of designing and optimizing database schemas for web applications.
weakPoints: No exposure to NoSQL databases beyond relational SQL databases.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate knowledge in database optimization and indexing techniques.
suggestedQuestions: Can you explain your approach to database normalization and optimization?
Describe a scenario where you improved query performance in a SQL database.

abilities.name: DevOps & CI/CD (Jenkins/GitLab CI)
strongPoints: Basic knowledge of DevOps practices, focusing on scheduled jobs and API integrations in ServiceNow.
Some familiarity with deployment practices in past projects.
weakPoints: Limited exposure to CI/CD pipelines and advanced DevOps automation tools.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate understanding of CI/CD pipeline setup and automation tools.
suggestedQuestions: How do you approach setting up a basic CI/CD pipeline?
What is your experience with managing deployments and scheduled jobs?

abilities.name: Agile Collaboration (Scrum/Kanban)
strongPoints: Experienced in working within Agile environments, particularly in roles where prioritizing tasks and working with cross-functional teams was essential.
Understands core Agile principles, with experience managing tasks and coordinating with teams.
weakPoints: Limited experience with advanced Agile roles such as Scrum Master.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate understanding of Agile principles and specific contributions in past teams.
suggestedQuestions: How do you handle changes in requirements within an Agile sprint?
Describe your experience managing tasks and priorities in a Scrum or Kanban environment.

education.field: Engenharia de Software com ênfase em métodos ágeis

professionalExperience.title: Java Developer
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Maintenance and enhancement of Java-based systems.

professionalExperience.title: Project Manager / Requirements Analyst
professionalExperience.responsibilities: Led requirement gathering, task definition, sprint planning, and delivery tracking.

abilities.name: React and Node.js Development
strongPoints: Basic experience in frontend development, with limited exposure to JavaScript and web frameworks.
weakPoints: Limited or no direct experience with React and Node.js development.
pointsOfAttention: Confirm familiarity with JavaScript frameworks.
suggestedQuestions: How would you approach a React project if assigned?
Describe any recent experience you have with JavaScript development.

abilities.name: APIs with Node.js & TypeScript
strongPoints: Experienced in backend API development with Java, familiar with API integration.
weakPoints: No documented experience with Node.js or TypeScript for API development.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate knowledge of API design principles in Java versus Node.js.
suggestedQuestions: How would you approach learning Node.js and TypeScript for backend APIs?
What are some best practices you use in Java API development?

abilities.name: Clean Code and SOLID Principles
strongPoints: Experienced in clean coding practices and applying SOLID principles within Java projects.
weakPoints: Less exposure to advanced application of SOLID principles beyond Java.
pointsOfAttention: Confirm understanding of SOLID principles in a JavaScript context.
suggestedQuestions: How do you implement SOLID principles in your code?
Can you describe a time you refactored code to improve its clarity and maintainability?

abilities.name: SQL and NoSQL Databases
strongPoints: Experienced with SQL databases for data management, supporting application development.
weakPoints: Limited exposure to NoSQL databases.
pointsOfAttention: Assess depth of SQL knowledge and understanding of NoSQL concepts.
suggestedQuestions: How would you handle data storage in a NoSQL database?
What indexing strategies do you use to optimize SQL queries?

abilities.name: Automated Testing (Jest/Mocha)
strongPoints: Basic understanding of testing principles and creating test cases.
weakPoints: Limited experience with Jest or Mocha for automated testing.
pointsOfAttention: Assess familiarity with automated testing practices and tools beyond Java.
suggestedQuestions: What is your approach to testing in software development?
How would you incorporate Jest or Mocha into your workflow?

abilities.name: DevOps & CI/CD (Jenkins/GitLab CI)
strongPoints: Experience with project management, task scheduling, and basic CI/CD principles.
weakPoints: Limited hands-on experience with Jenkins or GitLab CI for CI/CD pipelines.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate knowledge in setting up CI/CD workflows and deployment practices.
suggestedQuestions: Describe any experience you have with CI/CD practices.
How would you approach automating deployment in Jenkins or GitLab?

abilities.name: Git Version Control
strongPoints: Proficient with Git for version control and collaborative workflows.
weakPoints: Limited experience with complex branching strategies.
pointsOfAttention: Confirm experience with Git best practices in team settings.
suggestedQuestions: How do you handle branching and merging in Git?
Can you describe a challenging Git conflict you resolved?

abilities.name: Problem Solving
strongPoints: Strong analytical skills, particularly in software requirements and project management.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate approach to solving technical challenges and system optimization.
suggestedQuestions: Describe a time when you solved a complex problem in a project.
What is your approach to troubleshooting and debugging?

abilities.name: Agile Collaboration (Scrum/Kanban)
strongPoints: Extensive experience in Agile methodologies, particularly in project management and requirements.
weakPoints: Limited experience as a Scrum Master.
pointsOfAttention: Confirm experience with Agile ceremonies and team management.
suggestedQuestions: How do you manage priorities in an Agile environment?
What is your approach to Agile sprint planning and retrospectives?

abilities.name: Docker & Kubernetes
strongPoints: Basic knowledge of containerization concepts.
weakPoints: No hands-on experience with Docker or Kubernetes.
pointsOfAttention: Evaluate familiarity with Docker/Kubernetes for containerization.
suggestedQuestions: How would you approach learning Docker and Kubernetes?
What do you know about containerization and its benefits?

abilities.name: Microservices Architecture
strongPoints: Familiarity with service-oriented approaches in project management.
weakPoints: No practical experience with microservices architecture.
pointsOfAttention: Assess understanding of microservices principles and benefits.
suggestedQuestions: What do you understand about microservices architecture?
How would you implement a basic microservice?

openings.title: Mid-Level Fullstack React/Node
openings.description: Somos muito mais que uma empresa de tecnologia; somos uma comunidade diversa, plural e talentosa. Nosso propósito é liderar a transformação digital com excelência e agilidade, promovendo crescimento mútuo e genuíno em relações éticas e duradouras. Flexibilidade é uma de nossas marcas registradas, atuamos em diferentes modelos e formatos de equipe, mantendo nossa cultura leve, colaborativa e integrada, proporcionando equidade de oportunidades em um espaço onde todos se sintam seguros e ouvidos.
responsibilities: Desenvolver e manter aplicações web utilizando React no front-end e Node.js com TypeScript no back-end
Projetar e implementar APIs RESTful utilizando Node.js e frameworks como Express ou NestJS
Criar interfaces de usuário responsivas e dinâmicas utilizando React, Redux e bibliotecas modernas de front-end
Participar ativamente em todas as fases do ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software, desde o levantamento de requisitos até a entrega e manutenção de funcionalidades
Garantir a qualidade do código, seguindo práticas de clean code e princípios SOLID
Colaborar com desenvolvedores, designers e product owners para traduzir requisitos de negócios em soluções técnicas eficazes
Implementar testes unitários e de integração para garantir a qualidade do software
Participar de revisões de código e contribuir com sugestões para melhorar a performance e a manutenibilidade das soluções
Trabalhar com pipelines de CI/CD para automatizar processos de build, testes e deploy
Documentar processos e soluções técnicas para garantir que a equipe tenha clareza nas implementações

expanded: Experiência com React no desenvolvimento de interfaces de usuário modernas e escaláveis
Experiência com Node.js e TypeScript no desenvolvimento de APIs RESTful e serviços back-end
Conhecimento em boas práticas de desenvolvimento, incluindo clean code e princípios SOLID
Experiência com bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais, como PostgreSQL, MySQL ou MongoDB
Familiaridade com ferramentas de testes automatizados, como Jest, Mocha ou similares
Conhecimento em práticas de DevOps e ferramentas de CI/CD, como Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI ou similares
Experiência com controle de versão usando Git
Habilidades de resolução de problemas e otimização de sistemas
Capacidade de trabalhar de forma colaborativa em ambientes ágeis (Scrum, Kanban)
Experiência com contêineres e orquestração, como Docker e Kubernetes
Conhecimento em arquitetura de microsserviços e eventos
Familiaridade com serverless architecture utilizando serviços como AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions ou Azure Functions
Conhecimento em segurança no desenvolvimento de aplicações web
Experiência com frameworks de front-end adicionais, como Next.js
Familiaridade com ferramentas de monitoramento e logging, como ELK Stack, Prometheus ou Grafana

benefits: Plano Odontológico Uniodonto e Bradesco Dental

openings.title: Backend Developer
openings.description: Estamos buscando um desenvolvedor backend apaixonado por tecnologia e inovação. Nossa equipe é colaborativa e dinâmica, focada em construir soluções de alto desempenho e escalabilidade para apoiar nossos clientes no crescimento sustentável e digitalização de seus negócios.
responsibilities: Desenvolver e manter APIs robustas e escaláveis usando Node.js e TypeScript
Implementar integrações com sistemas internos e de terceiros
Colaborar com equipes de front-end para definir contratos de API
Garantir a segurança e a performance das aplicações backend
Manter a documentação técnica atualizada para facilitar a manutenção
Trabalhar com práticas de DevOps para deploy e monitoramento contínuo

expanded: Experiência com Node.js e TypeScript no desenvolvimento de APIs
Conhecimento em bancos de dados SQL e NoSQL, como PostgreSQL e MongoDB
Familiaridade com Docker e orquestração de contêineres
Experiência com segurança e autenticação de APIs
Experiência com Git para controle de versão
Capacidade de trabalhar em um ambiente colaborativo ágil
Conhecimento em arquitetura de microsserviços
Experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento como Prometheus ou Grafana
Familiaridade com testes automatizados usando Jest ou Mocha
Experiência com serviços em cloud como AWS ou GCP

openings.title: Mobile Developer
openings.description: Procuramos um desenvolvedor mobile com experiência em criação de aplicativos Android e iOS usando React Native. Nossa equipe é focada na criação de soluções móveis que melhoram a experiência dos usuários e geram valor para o negócio.
responsibilities: Desenvolver e manter aplicativos móveis para Android e iOS com React Native
Trabalhar em conjunto com designers para implementar interfaces de usuário intuitivas
Garantir performance e responsividade das aplicações móveis
Integrar APIs de backend com o aplicativo móvel
Escrever testes unitários e de integração para garantir a qualidade do software
Publicar e gerenciar versões de aplicativos nas lojas Google Play e Apple App Store

expanded: Experiência com React Native no desenvolvimento de aplicativos móveis
Conhecimento de integrações com APIs RESTful
Familiaridade com JavaScript e TypeScript
Experiência com controle de versão usando Git
Conhecimento em design responsivo e otimização de performance
Habilidade para resolver problemas técnicos e garantir usabilidade
Experiência com Firebase para autenticação e armazenamento
Familiaridade com práticas de DevOps em aplicativos móveis
Conhecimento de Swift ou Kotlin para desenvolvimento nativo
Experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento de aplicativos, como Firebase Crashlytics

openings.title: Junior QA Engineer
openings.description: Estamos em busca de um QA Engineer junior para auxiliar na garantia de qualidade das nossas aplicações. Você irá colaborar com uma equipe experiente para testar e validar funcionalidades e assegurar que nossos produtos atendem aos mais altos padrões.
responsibilities: Escrever e executar casos de teste manuais e automatizados
Colaborar com desenvolvedores para entender os requisitos e especificações
Identificar e reportar bugs e problemas de usabilidade
Criar e manter documentação de testes
Ajudar na implementação de pipelines de testes automatizados
Participar de reuniões para discutir melhorias de qualidade e processos

expanded: Conhecimento básico de ferramentas de automação de testes, como Selenium ou Cypress
Familiaridade com metodologias de testes manuais e automatizados
Habilidade em identificar e documentar bugs
Conhecimento em controle de versão com Git
Capacidade de colaborar em equipe
Familiaridade com CI/CD e práticas DevOps
Conhecimento básico em SQL para consultas de banco de dados
Experiência com ferramentas de teste de carga, como JMeter
Noções básicas de programação, especialmente em JavaScript ou Python
